alert.note: Alert for Apache (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:56PM MST until August 10 at 4:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MST near Hunt in APACHE COUNTY... At 354 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hunt, or 33 miles northeast of Show Low, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Concho Lake, Hunt, Mesa Redonda, and Concho. This includes the following highways... Highway 180 between mile markers 332 and 349. State Route 61 between mile markers 368 and 377. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
